var table = document.getElementById('select_me');
var rows = table.getElementsByTagName('tr');

for (var i=1; i <= 151; i++) {
  var xpCell = rows[i].getElementsByTagName('td')[3];
  
  var string = i + '\t';
  string += xpCell.innerHTML.substring(1, xpCell.innerHTML.length-1);

  console.log(string);
}
